instructions:
How to Play

Drag a jigsaw piece to the correct location on the image. Solve the puzzle as quickly as possible to earn medals (1-3) and a completion trophy. On each difficulty level you will earn a different type of medal and a different trophy.

In the settings menu, you can toggle "Categories Disabled" to "Enabled" to enable separate assembly areas (e.g.: an "edge piece" category). The icon will create a new category. Click the new category's tab to switch to it. will edit its name, and will remove it. Pressing allows you to quickly select a set of pieces -- press it again to place those pieces in a newly defined category.
